sentences.en: A trustee owes several duties to the beneficiary or beneficiaries.
sentences.cn: 受托人对受益人负有多项义务.

sentences.en: All banking charges are fou the account of the beneficiary.
sentences.cn: 一切银行费用均由受益人负担.

sentences.en: All banking charges outside DongGuan China are for beneficiary's account.
sentences.cn: 中国东莞以外的一切银行费用由受益人负担.

sentences.en: All banking charges outside of opening bank are for beneficiary & rsquo account.
sentences.cn: 开证行以外的所有银行费用由 受益 人承担.

sentences.en: All banking charges outside of opening bank are for beneficiary's account.
sentences.cn: 开证行以外的所有银行用度由受益人承担.

sentences.en: Beneficiary means the party in whose favor a credit is issued.
sentences.cn: 受益人意指信用证中受益的一方.

sentences.en: Beneficiary means the party in whose favour a credit is issued.
sentences.cn: 受益人意指接受信用证并享受其利益的一方.

sentences.en: Beneficiary's draft is negotiable at sight by the negotiating bank.
sentences.cn: 受益人汇票可通过议付行即期议付.

sentences.en: It is taxable, though, if you identify your estate as the beneficiary.
sentences.cn: 如果你按受益人确定你的遗产,尽管它是要课税的, 也不用交税.

sentences.en: Legal ownership rests with the trustee, and equitable ownership rests with the beneficiary.
sentences.cn: 受托人享有普通法上的所有权, 受益人享有衡平法了的所有权.

sentences.en: One of the main beneficiaries of the early election is thought to be the former president.
sentences.cn: 前总统被认为是早期选举的主要受益者之一。

sentences.en: The beneficiary of the L / C is to be China National Corporation, Beijing.
sentences.cn: 信用证的受益人为中国工艺品进出口公司北京分公司.

sentences.en: The trust legal relation includes the tripartite party: client, trustee and beneficiary.
sentences.cn: 信托法律关系包括三方当事人: 委托人 、 受托人和受益人.

sentences.en: The trustee must manage the trust property for the beneficiary.
sentences.cn: 受托人必须受益人管理信托财产.

sentences.en: Who will be the main beneficiary of the cuts in income tax?
sentences.cn: 削减所得税的主要受益者将是谁？

sentences.en: You're a co - beneficiary of Noy Vipraxay's life insurance, right?
sentences.cn: 诺伊·卫普拉克西的人寿保险你也是受益人之一, 对 吧 ?

words.tran_cn: 受益地；获利地；有使用权地
圣俸；有俸圣职；僧侣之禄
为牧师提供薪俸；授有俸圣职于（benefice的过去分词）
[金融][保险]受益人，受惠者；封臣

phrases.tran_cn: 收款人姓名；受益人名称

trans.tran_en: someone who gets advantages from an action or change
